This place is a five star food lovers paradise!!  We stumbled in here after a long day of travel and empty stomachs after a stay in Madrid where we tired of tapas very quickly!  We were looking forward to a filling, enjoyable meal.  That's exactly what we got.  It was before 8pm when we stopped in, and the only server inside told us that they don't start serving food for another 30 minutes or so, but we were welcome to start with a drink.  That sounded perfectly fine to us.  We ordered a bottle of wine and the server brought us some much needed flat water.  He came to take our order and said that he will put the order in and the kitchen will make it when it opens.  He was great at suggesting items for us to try.  On his suggestion, we ordered the goat cheese salad, the pasta Bolognese, and the pizza special of the day with mushroom, tomato and olive oil.  The salad was sensational with large chunks of fresh goat cheese and various vegetables.  I could not stop raving about the corn on the salad!  It was the best tasting corn I have ever had!  Maybe I am just used to eating disgusting GMO corn in the US and I don't really know what corn tastes like.  Whatever the reason, the salad was absolutely TO DIE FOR!  The pizza was one of the best I have ever had.  It didn't have any tomato sauce on it, and it didn't need it.  It was moist and had a nice crispy crust.  I am pretty sure I will dream of this meal for many years to come!
